patthana15.14:1.1_0: Hetuṁ hīnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.14:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ majjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nanahetu namajjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.14:3.1_0: Hetuṁ paṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu napaṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
